doc.title: Bleeding Coney
doc.plot: A man has a vision and must follow it, and it leads him to Coney Island. He follows the commercial oriented creatures in his mind which lead him to Coney Island. They destroy and create a new Coney Island before his eyes. He continues forth, feeling disgusted and ends up digging up more mayhem. In the end, he only has his mind to deal with this development nightmare of Coney Island and kills off the demons for the moment.
